verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> gathered <S%H6908><s%> together all <S%H3605><s%> their armies <S%H4264><s%> to Aphek: <S%H663><s%> and the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> pitched <S%H2583><s%> by a fountain <S%H5869><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>

And the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> on by hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> and by thousands: <S%H505><s%> but David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> on in the rear guard <S%H314><s%> with Achish. <S%H397><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> do these <S%H428><s%> Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> here? And Achish <S%H397><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> Is not this <S%H2088><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> with me these <S%H2088><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> or <S%H176><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and I have found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> fault <S%H3972><s%> in him since he fell <S%H5307><s%> to me to this <S%H2088><s%> day? <S%H3117><s%>

And the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were wroth <S%H7107><s%> with him; and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Make this fellow <S%H376><s%> return, <S%H7725><s%> that he may go <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to his place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have appointed <S%H6485><s%> him, and let him not go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with us to battle, <S%H4421><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%> he be an adversary <S%H7854><s%> to us: for with which <S%H4100><s%> should he reconcile <S%H7521><s%> himself to his master? <S%H113><s%> should it not be with the heads <S%H7218><s%> of these <S%H1992><s%> men? <S%H582><s%>

Is not this <S%H2088><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> they sang <S%H6030><s%> one to another in dances, <S%H4246><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> his thousands, <S%H505><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> his ten <S%H7233><s%> thousands? <S%H7233><s%>

Then Achish <S%H397><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Surely, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> lives, <S%H2416><s%> you have been upright, <S%H3477><s%> and your going <S%H3318><s%> out and your coming <S%H935><s%> in with me in the host <S%H4264><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> in my sight: <S%H5869><s%> for I have not found <S%H4672><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in you since the day <S%H3117><s%> of your coming <S%H935><s%> to me to this <S%H2088><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> nevertheless the lords <S%H5633><s%> favor <S%H2896><s%> you not.
Why now <S%H6258><s%> return, <S%H7725><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> in peace, <S%H7965><s%> that you displease <S%H6213><s%> not the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Achish, <S%H397><s%> But what <S%H4100><s%> have I done? <S%H6213><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> have you found <S%H4672><s%> in your servant <S%H5650><s%> so long <S%H3117><s%> as I have been <S%H1961><s%> with you to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that I may not go <S%H935><s%> fight <S%H3898><s%> against the enemies <S%H341><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%> the king? <S%H4428><s%>

And Achish <S%H397><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you are good <S%H2896><s%> in my sight, <S%H5869><s%> as an angel of God: <S%H430><s%> notwithstanding <S%H389><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have said, <S%H559><s%> He shall not go <S%H5927><s%> up with us to the battle. <S%H4421><s%>

Why now <S%H6258><s%> rise <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> with your master's <S%H113><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> that are come <S%H935><s%> with you: and as soon as you be up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and have light, <S%H216><s%> depart. <S%H3212><s%>

So David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> to depart <S%H3212><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>
